title.rendered: Built A Million Dollar Blog, Next Stop is YouTube (5 powerful tips for successful blogging)

content.rendered:
6 Years!

Money Vikings are now celebrating 5 years blogging about all things investing, personal finance, family, health and more. We have evolved through the years and are continuing to evolve now as we expand into YouTube. But our mission remains the same: Deliver to you a treasure trove of ideas and inspiration to live a life of True Wealth!

True Wealth Journey

Jerry and I became friends many years ago. About 6 years ago we discovered that we both had an interest in investing, personal finance and related topics. We started our own little investing club, exchanging ideas. We had already been investing for about 15 years prior to this with much success. But much of our knowledge also came from the school of hard knocks. We made our fair share of investing and wealth building mistakes.

A True Knowledge Gap

We realized about this time that people generally do not talk about money or investing. This seemed insane to not discuss a topic and skill set that is absolutely essential in our society to living a life of True Wealth. We then realized that wealth was about a lot more than a number in an investing account. True Wealth is a combination of wealth, investing, health, family, friends and even collectible games that bring people together and exercise our minds. This lead to years of hard work developing our million dollar blog. This was not a success only overnight journey, it took years to develop our million dollar blog.

Pandemic Years

The Pandemic years brought on our paid subscription service and discord community. We built a global community of folks that gather virtually and share ideas on investing and wealth building. A positive community of people that support each other and their goals.

The Money Vikings Book

As we left the pandemic era behind, Money Vikings captured the best ideas to build wealth in our very own book: Conquer Financial Freedom. Check it out, for the price of a Starbucks coffee a person has a virtual treasure trove of wealth building ideas and can learn from what worked for us:

YouTube

Our next growth area is our YouTube content. Here we determined we can reach a wider audience with our wealth building content. We are the Swiss army knife of living a life of True Wealth! If you have not done so, check us out and subscribe below:

https://www.youtube.com/@MoneyVikings

Check Me Out as Spiderman!

Other Million Dollar Blog Ideas

It’s Free to You!

Part of why we do what we do is to learn ourselves and to make our country stronger. Most of us never receive any kind of education in personal finance, health or wealth building. And the good news is that most of what we provide is absolutely free to you. The only thing that costs small amounts of money is our book or joining our private discord group where we offer one on one financial coaching!

Join In!

Come join us and connect with us. We learn from you as much as you can learn from us. Let’s keep the ideas and inspiration flowing to build a nation of strong Money Vikings. You too can be financially independent, healthy and more!

More Popular YouTube

After we developed our popular million dollar blog, we are focused now on building our YouTube channel because it is fun, informative, creative and we are spreading knowledge everyday that can help millions of people. We will help to build a better stronger world of Money Viking warriors! Best to you in health and wealth every day. Here are samples from our focus areas of investing, collecting and health:

Investing

Health

Collecting

Collectibles are about a lot more than silly things from our childhood. Collectibles can be valueable alternative investment vehicles, things we enjoy and can also bring people together. Collectible trading card games exercise our brains and bring friends and family together to do something positive and constructive. This is a key aspect of a life of True Wealth!

5 Tips for Creating a Successful Million Dollar Blog for Passive Income

Building a million dollar blog takes time and effort, but it is possible if you follow the right steps. Here are five steps to help you build a successful blog:

  1. Choose a profitable niche: Choose a topic that has a large audience and a high potential for monetization. This could be anything from finance, health, lifestyle, or technology. Research the market and competition to find a unique angle that will set you apart. We chose investing, health and collectibles in what we call True Wealth.
  2. Create high-quality content: Your content is the backbone of your blog, and it needs to be informative, engaging, and valuable to your readers. Focus on creating quality content that solves a problem or provides a solution to your target audience. We have spent thousands of hours developing our content and we take pride in what we present. We present tried and true concepts that we have stress tested.
  3. Build an email list: Building an email list is essential for growing your blog and monetizing it. Offer a lead magnet, such as a free e-book, guide, or webinar, in exchange for an email address. Use an email marketing tool like Mailchimp or ConvertKit to automate your email campaigns.
  4. Monetize your blog: There are various ways to monetize your blog, such as affiliate marketing, sponsored content, display ads, and selling your own products or services. Choose the monetization method that best fits your niche and audience. Now more than ever are many ways to monetize our creative content.
  5. Promote your blog: Promote your blog on social media, guest post on other blogs, collaborate with influencers, and invest in SEO to increase your traffic and grow your audience. Consistency is key, so keep producing high-quality content and promoting it regularly.

Remember that building a million-dollar blog takes time and effort, but if you stay focused and follow these steps, you can achieve success.
